settings.name: Filter by Time Interval
settings.description: Determines the size of the interval (minutes) that the input data should be thinned too. Blank means no filtering takes place. NOTE: We do not recommend applying this for high-resolution datasets of duration greater than 1 month.

settings.name: Bind additional timestamp columns
settings.description: Determines whether or not to bind additional timestamp columns (hour, minute, seconds etc.) to the dataset.

settings.name: Bind index column
settings.description: Determines whether or not to bind an 'index' column consisting of ID and timestamp data.

settings.name: Bind speed column
settings.description: Determines whether or not to bind a 'speed' column (units: km/h).

settings.name: Bind distance travelled column
settings.description: Determines whether or not to bind a 'distance travelled' column (units: metres).

settings.name: Bind UTM location data
settings.description: Determines whether or not to generate and append UTM (Universal Transverse Mercator) data.

settings.name: Provide EPSG code for UTM coordinates
settings.description: Please provide a valid EPSG code if 'createUTMs' (above) is selected. Defaults to EPSG:32733.

settings.name: Bind 'time difference' column
settings.description: Determines whether or not to bind a 'time difference' column (units: hours).

settings.name: Bind 'study name' column
settings.description: Determines whether or not to bind a standardised study name column. Recommended if using several studies later in this workflow

settings.name: Name of index column
settings.description: Insert the name of the column to be used as primary identification. Blank means the default will be used. NOTE: Please replace periods (.) with underscores (_) in any provided names.

settings.name: Name of altitude column
settings.description: Insert the name of the column containing altitude data (if any). If left blank, an empty column is created. NOTE: Please replace periods (.) with underscores (_) in any provided names.

settings.name: Name of temperature column
settings.description: Insert the name of the column containing temperature data in celsius (if any). If left blank, an empty column is created. NOTE: Please replace periods (.) with underscores (_) in any provided names.

settings.name: Name of heading column
settings.description: Insert the name of the column containing heading data in degrees (if any). If left blank, an empty column is craeteed. NOTE: Please replace periods (.) with underscores (_) in any provided names.

settings.name: Keep only essential columns
settings.description: Determines whether or not keep only columns relevant to later steps of the cluster-detection workflow.
